column1: in memory of harry f smith -- sheenan funeral home| born: june 6
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:sheenan funeral home. dunellen
column9: died peacefully at the chelsea in bridgewater on june 13
column10: 2015. he was born in somerville to the late william and clara and had lived in dunellen for almost 66 years. he worked as a supervisor for union carbide in bound brook for many years before retiring. he was predeceased by his wife of 65 years
column11: anna and a grandson anthony. surviving is a daughter clara ann de maria and her husband tony of dunellen
column12: a son jim smith and his wife sheila of north carolina
column16: and brian de. maria and 9 great grandchildren madison
column23: and jillian and justin. private funeral arrangements are by the sheenan funeral home in dunellen.
